Podium

An Open source documentation template for your projects.

Build with known frameworks and libraries

Angular JS

Podium uses angular js as a UI framework to build the app.

Angular JS

Bootstrap 3

Podium uses twitter bootstrap sass for the UI styling.

Bootstrap

Gulp

Podium uses gulp for automation of all the tasks.

Gulp

Compatible with

GitHub Pages

Podium is 100% compatible with GitHub Pages, just say "NODE_ENV=prod gulp" from your command line and commit.

Demo

DOKKU

Dokku

Podium is compatible with dokku, just clone it in public folder of your dokku nodejs project, we will provide a dokku config project soon.

Dokku

Any Server

Any Server

Podium is 100% compatible Apache, nginx, etc. Its just pure html, js and css. Best for any type of project documentation.

Color][gap
